entry: Delighted to become a research intern (again!) at [Microsoft Research](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/research/group/systems-innovation/) this summer.
I am honored to receive the UIUC CS Department [Kenichi Miura Award](https://cs.illinois.edu/about/awards/graduate-fellowships-awards/kenichi-miura-award).
We published our study on file system security vulnerabilities at [ACM Transactions on Storage](https://dl.acm.org/journal/tos).
Our work on a learning-based flash translation layer LeaFTL has been accepted by [ASPLOS '23](https://asplos-conference.org/2023).
Our research on a learning-based storage harvesting framework BlockFlex has been accepted by [OSDI '22](https://www.usenix.org/conference/osdi22).

old_entry: Our workshop paper on redesigning data centers for renewable energy has been accepted by HotNets '21.

entry: Our research on a crash-consistency testing framework for HPC storage has been accepted by [SC '21](https://sc21.supercomputing.org).
